class.name: wxBannerWindow
class.description: A simple banner window showing either a bitmap or text.

style.name: direction
style.label: Direction
style.description: The side along which the banner will be positioned.

bitmap.label: Bitmap
bitmap.description: Bitmap to use as the banner background.

text.name: title
text.label: Title
text.description: Banner title, should be single line.

colour.name: gradient-start
colour.label: Gradient start
colour.description: Starting colour of the gradient used as banner background. Can't be used if a valid bitmap is specified.

colour.name: gradient-end
colour.label: Gradient end
colour.description: End colour of the gradient used as banner background. Can't be used if a valid bitmap is specified.
